title: A durable hydrophobic photothermal membrane based on a honeycomb structure MXene for stable and efficient solar desalination
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10370-10377
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08157E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chunjiao Liu, Peng Wu
A biomimetic honeycomb structure and the modification of AuNFs were used to improve the photothermal conversion capability of MXene. Efficient solar driven water evaporation is achieved by covering the MXene/AuNFs with a hydrophobic layer.
